metadata.name: Incantation-2
metadata.description:
1/1 NFT
from the painting "Incantation-2", 2022, acrylic on canvas, 116 X 89 cm ( 45,7 X 35 inch)
Artist : Olivier Alibert

On the abstract backgrounds of my colorful paintings stand out forms that freely draw their inspiration from eclectic sources: nature, sculpture, ceramics, art history, archaeology, abstraction, ...
My paintings are marked by an importance of the void between the associated elements, a taste for hybridization and mystery, a search for intensity and expressiveness.
Each painting then creates an imaginary space for the viewer.
This work also finds extensions in series of drawings.
